ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>The response shows understanding of the context but lacks naturalness in phrasing and could be more direct, which affects persona consistency. Short note: Good attempt at balancing relevance with protocol adherence; however, improving conversational flow would enhance authenticity as a Gatekeeper.

baseline_no_context<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>4<TAB>4<TAB>The response is relevant and consistent but lacks the personal touch expected from an old royal guard, which affects naturalness slightly. Short note: Adequate for a standard

ratings.overall_quality: 4.5 Not immediately granting access, maintains persona and context relevance while being slightly less natural in tone
